EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale smiles to himself, as if enjoying a private joke. A pulsing glow of netherese magic flares from his chest, growing more intense with each heartbeat. Gale closes his eyes serenely as the magic overcomes him. The netherbrain utters a fearful SFX screech as the whole screen is engulfed.
EditorData.logicalname: Cinematic - Solo Companion Gale blows up brain

Text.Value: We might still have a chance.
Do it, Gale.
Don't worry - I'll handle matters from here. And gods willing, there'll be plenty of folk left to tell our tale after we're gone.

EditorData.NodeContext: reassuring. Projecting some, but still speaking in a heartfelt manner to a comrade. Atop a huge brain floating high above the city, battles raging throughout.

Text.Value: Then DIE.
Thrall? No, I think you're mistaken. The name's Gale of Waterdeep. A pleasure to make your acquaintance.
Though our time together will be exceptionally brief. Farewell, and happy landing.

EditorData.NodeContext: Projecting. Atop a huge brain floating high above the city, battles raging throughout. Cheerful in the face of death (about to blow himself up to save the day)

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale smiles to himself, as if enjoying a private joke. A pulsing glow of netherese magic flares from his chest, growing more intense with each heartbeat. Gale closes his eyes serenely as the magic overcomes him. The netherbrain utters a fearful SFX screech as the whole screen is engulfed.
EditorData.logicalname: Cinematic - Solo Avatar Gale blows up brain

Text.Value: This is our chance. Close your eyes. You'll be wherever you want to be in but a moment.

EditorData.NodeContext: Reassuring. Projecting some, but still speaking in a heartfelt manner to a comrade. Atop a huge brain floating high above the city, battles raging throughout.

Text.Value: Until we wake, my friend.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere. Projecting some, but still speaking in a heartfelt manner to a comrade. Atop a huge brain floating high above the city, battles raging throughout.

Text.Value: Thrall? No, I think you're mistaken. The name's Gale of Waterdeep. A pleasure to make your acquaintance.

EditorData.NodeContext: Projecting. Atop a huge brain floating high above the city, battles raging throughout. Defiant and unfazed in the face of death. Line is a callback to how he first introduces himself

Text.Value: Up you go then, Gale. Best make this count... The whole world's watching.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Companion Gale grabs onto the tentacle, and pauses, looking upwards. Pulses of mocking noise burst through his mind. After a moment, he shakes off the hesitiation and starts ascending, his expression resolute.
EditorData.NodeContext: Speaking to himself, urging himself on for the final confrontation. Occurs in a relatively secluded side room just before he ascends to the brain.

Text.Value: Pleasure? You should be AFRAID.
It has. And a pleasure, a privilege, a tale for the ages, and if I'm being honest... the very best time I've had in my entire life.

EditorData.NodeContext: Sincere, lots of camaraderie. Projecting some, but still speaking in a heartfelt manner to a comrade. Atop a huge brain floating high above the city, battles raging throughout.

Text.Value: Come to die? Come to kneel? Surrender and live - THRALL.
At least, victory in which we live to tell the tale.

EditorData.NodeContext: Projecting some, but still speaking in a heartfelt manner to a comrade. Atop a huge brain floating high above the city, battles raging throughout. Referring to the orb - he can destroy the brain, but the party will die

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: A poignant shot of Elminster witnessing Gale's explosion from afar.

A pulsing glow of netherese magic flares from Gale's chest, growing more intense with each heartbeat. He closes his eyes serenely as the magic overcomes him, then the other party members. The netherbrain utters a fearful SFX screech as the whole screen is engulfed.
EditorData.logicalname: Cinematic - Gale blows up brain (party present)

Text.Value: We've tried our very best, but it seems victory is beyond our grasp, I'm sad to say.

EditorData.NodeContext: Projecting some, but still speaking in a heartfelt manner to a comrade. Atop a huge brain floating high above the city, battles raging throughout. 'We tried, but I don't think we're going to win this fight'

Text.Value: And smear my knees with your brain gunk? I think not.
Until we wake, my love.

EditorData.NodeContext: Sincere. Speaking to a lover. Projecting some, but still speaking in a heartfelt manner. Atop a huge brain floating high above the city, battles raging throughout.

Text.Value: It doesn't even deserve a response. Just think of those you care about, and unleash your power.
*The end awaits. The last sights you'll ever see. The last words you'll ever utter. The last action you'll ever take... Best make them count.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Avatar Gale grabs onto the tentacle, and pauses, looking upwards. Pulses of mocking noise burst through his mind. After a moment, he shakes off the hesitiation and starts ascending, his expression resolute.

Text.Value: It's been an honour.

EditorData.stateContext: Atop the Netherbrain, elevated above Baldur's Gate

Synopsis:
Gale ascends the stalk to the netherbrain, then sacrifices himself by unleashing the netherese orb and destroying the brain. Gale can be:
Solo avatar
Solo companion
Companion in company with the player (unleashing the orb as a final contingency once it seems they cannot win the fight)
